PHRASE.LANG: Name
The Dream Yacht: Arctic Voyage
Le yacht de rêve : voyage arctique
Die Traumyacht: Reise in die Arktis
Lo yacht dei sogni: viaggio nell'Artico
Yate de ensueño "Travesía por el Ártico"
The Dream Yacht: Arctic Voyage
꿈의 요트: 북극 항해
The Dream Yacht: Arctic Voyage
夢幻遊艇：北極之旅
夢幻遊艇：北極之旅
The Dream Yacht: Arctic Voyage
Desc

Treat them to the sights of breathtaking glaciers, giant ice formations and crystal blue waters with the Dream Yacht: Arctic Voyage. Explore three decks, chill out on the private ice shelf and collect 20 unique rewards. Live the dream!

Faites-leur découvrir les panoramas de glaciers à couper le souffle, des formations de glace géantes et des eaux d'un bleu cristal avec le yacht de rêve : voyage arctique. Explorez les trois ponts, détendez-vous sur la corniche de glace privée et collectez 20 récompenses uniques. Vivez votre rêve !

Lade deine Freunde mit der Traumyacht: Reise in die Arktis zu atemberaubenden Gletschern, riesigen Eisgebilden und kristallklarem Wasser ein. Erkunde drei Decks, chill am privaten Eisschelf und sammle 20 einmalige Belohnungen. Lebe den Traum!

Regalagli la vista dei ghiacciai mozzafiato, delle gigantesche formazioni di ghiaccio e delle acque color blu cristallo con lo yacht dei sogni: viaggio nell'Artico. Esplora i tre ponti, rilassati sul banco di ghiaccio privato e colleziona 20 premi unici. Vivi il sogno!

Embárcate en un crucero por los glaciares mas sorprendentes y las aguas más cristalinas a bordo del yate de ensueño "Travesía por el Ártico". Asómate a las tres cubiertas, relájate en tu mini iceberg privado y consigue 20 premios exclusivos. ¡Esto es vida!

Treat them to the sights of breathtaking glaciers, giant ice formations and crystal blue waters with the Dream Yacht: Arctic Voyage. Explore three decks, chill out on the private ice shelf and collect 20 unique rewards. Live the dream!
꿈의 요트를 타고 숨을 멎게 하는 빙하, 거대한 결빙, 수정같이 푸른 바다의 장관을 그들에게 선사하세요: 북극 항해. 3층의 갑판을 모두 둘러 보고, 개인 얼음 칸에서 몸을 식히면서 20개의 진귀한 보상품도 수집하세요. 꿈을 실현해봐요!

Treat them to the sights of breathtaking glaciers, giant ice formations and crystal blue waters with the Dream Yacht: Arctic Voyage. Explore three decks, chill out on the private ice shelf and collect 20 unique rewards. Live the dream!
招待他們來趟「夢幻遊艇：北極之旅」，一睹壯觀冰河、巨大冰層，以及清澈見底的湛藍海水。本遊艇共有三層甲板，不但可在私人冰棚透心涼，也可以收集20種寶物。快來實現夢想吧！
